translations: n．女服务员（复数）：在餐馆、酒吧等场所为顾客提供餐饮服务的女性工作人员。
· The waitresses were very friendly and attentive.
女服务员非常友好且细心。

sentences.sentence: Within a year, I had to hire another cook and four waitresses.
sentences.translation: 一年之内，我不得不又雇了一个厨师和四个女服务员。

sentences.sentence: All the waiters and waitresses can speak at least one foreign language.
sentences.translation: 所有的男女服务员都至少会说一门外语。

sentences.sentence: A lot of people don't like to give waiters extra money—a tip, but maybe those people don't understand about waitresses and waiters.
sentences.translation: 很多人不喜欢给服务员额外的钱——小费，但可能是那些人不了解服务员们。
